sources.title: Shelter (1998) Action, Thriller | John Allen Nelson, Brenda Bakke & Charles Durning | Full Movie
sources.description:
A US Treasury Agent finds himself in opposition with his fellow agents who are involved in gun running. This puts him on the run and into the hands of a Greek mafia boss.

Director: Scott Paulin 
Writers: Max Strom, John Allen Nelson
Cast: John Allen Nelson, Brenda Bakke, Charles Durning, Kurtwood Smith
Genres: Action, Thriller

00:00:00 Introduction - full length movie
00:02:46 A botched mission
00:11:07 That 70's dad wants to kill greek mafia
00:14:41 Car accident meet cute
00:21:35 Ringside seats to mafia assassination
00:28:05 The clean up
00:35:57 A job offer
00:43:37 Batter-up
00:47:30 In the sexy club
00:50:40 Meeting with the feds
00:59:06 Shooting practice
01:03:36 Damsel in distress
01:11:53 Dead man

This video is available with subtitles in more than 30 languages. Click on ⚙️ and choose your preferred language.

metadata.Plot: A US Treasury Agent finds himself in opposition with his fellow agents who are involved in gun running. This puts him on the run and into the hands of a Greek mafia chief whom he saves from an assassination attempt by the agency. Actually he had become attracted to the mafia chief's wife, who reminds him of his comatose wife, and in saving her also saved the chief. All of which sets up an affair between the agent and the wife.
metadata.Actors: John Allen Nelson, Brenda Bakke, Peter Onorati
